title: I can't play the game (mouse and keyboard not responding in game)
body:
Lucky for me it was an aram and I could jump onto my husband's computer to play. But on my computer the normal mouse icon was persistent to the game. I couldn't click anything. I couldn't press any buttons to bring up any menus or anything. I couldn't even close down the window without having to click 'close window' from my taskbar like a billion times. I have no idea what is going on.

I did notice that when loading in my mouse will flash to the glove icon that is normal in League and immediately go back to the regular arrow. I don't know if that means my mouse somehow isn't in the window when the game loads in but it should be because I'm full screened in game. Not borderless or windowed. 

I ran the client repair and nothing came back. This is very sudden as I was playing games just fine two days ago and nothing has changed since.

Also I can't even submit a ticket about this.
[Me trying to submit a ticket while logged in. And being told to log in](https://gyazo.com/62f884b89737c6d94322eed26f00d499)
[My attempt to log in despite being logged in](https://gyazo.com/b5f9793dd77b8e67d8a5cfcf52e1eee0)

replies.body:
Weeeeeird, it kinda sounds like your pc was having the Discord Overlay problems and your Husbands pc maybe didn't have that enabled or maybe Discord was turned off on his side. Do me a favor and make sure Discord is closed out entirely, or make sure the overlay is turned off, and then test it in a custom game. 


About that ticket page, make sure you're [**cleared your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) really quick, then try logging in on the main League landing page. *Then* try hitting submit a request to see if the tickets work now!

It's actually funny because my Discord overlay isn't on but my husband's is. And for my computer the Discord overlay is actually entirely turned off. By now I've turned off my computer a couple times and whatever it was is gone and I can play normally. But I can assure you it wasn't Discord because of my husband having it on as well as the overlay. 

As for the ticket page that did the trick. I don't know if it matters but on that page originally it had my League icon displayed next to my name. And after it it was displaying my account's icon if that makes sense.

Weeeeeird, must be something else taking the focus of the window somehow. There are a lot of programs that can do this so sometimes it's hard to narrow down the culprit. If you shoot your logs over to our techs in that ticket they should be able to spot what's going on!
turn off disc overlay also dont come here for answers they'll only ask you to trouble shoot. they only post real answers on twitter.

That troubleshooting helps us to narrow down the main problem, which we can then forward that info over to our techs to get a quicker solution to problems. It sucks sometimes when people don't return to followup on the steps we give, as that's an essential part to fixing things. We can't always pinpoint the main issue without troubleshooting.

I'm so glad you've found a lot of help through our twitter support! We've been working on upping their tech knowledge to be more useful since so many choose that avenue of support. I'm really curious on what interaction you had, and what went so well, so we can start doing even better ^_^!
I don't have discord overlay on. There isn't an overlay at all. And I didn't have a choice as I noted in my post I can't submit a ticket. But thanks anyway

This was the fix that worked for me, another post said that launching league as admin worked for him. Also even if the overlay doesn't show up in game, make sure to tick it off and check in a training match with the practice tool.

It is ticked off and has been since Discord updated it to be on automatically. Launching it as admin has no effect either. Sadly I can't change my settings outside of a game to make it windowed or something.

Same here, i've never had this issue before and was playing fine yesterday. I'm afraid of getting punished for leaving even though ive been spending the last 20 minutes trying to get where i can move in game
Same thing is happening to me. I tried repatching the game and then doing the full repair from the client but it hasn't helped. My graphics card is up to date and everything else seems fine
